title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A traditional Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook spaghetti until al dente.
Cook pancetta in olive oil until crisp, add garlic for 1 minute and remove from heat.
Whisk eggs, parmesan, and cracked pepper in a bowl.
Toss hot pasta with pancetta, then add egg mixture, stirring quickly. Loosen with pasta water.
Season to taste and serve immediately.

title: Quick Chicken Stir-Fry
description: Tender chicken with crisp vegetables in a savory soy-ginger sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken with soy sauce and ginger for 10 minutes.
Stir-fry chicken until browned, add vegetables and cook until crisp-tender.
Add garlic, toss with remaining sauce, and serve over rice.

title: Creamy Vegetable Curry
description: A rich and aromatic curry loaded with seasonal vegetables in a coconut milk base.
instructions: Sauté curry paste, add vegetables, chickpeas, and coconut milk.
Simmer 20 minutes until tender and serve over rice.

title: Mediterranean Quinoa Salad
description: Protein-packed quinoa tossed with crunchy vegetables and a lemon herb dressing.
instructions: Cook quinoa, toss with chopped vegetables, feta, and lemon dressing.

title: Wild Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy arborio rice slowly simmered with mushrooms, white wine, and parmesan.
instructions: Toast rice in oil, deglaze with wine, add warm broth gradually until creamy, fold in mushrooms and cheese.

title: Korean Beef Bulgogi Bowls
description: Thinly sliced beef marinated in a sweet-savory sauce, served over rice with pickled veggies.
instructions: Marinate beef, stir-fry over high heat, and serve over rice with vegetables.

title: Smoky Tomato Shakshuka
description: Poached eggs nestled in a spiced tomato and pepper sauce, perfect for brunch.
instructions: Simmer tomatoes with peppers and spices, crack in eggs, cover until set.

title: Grilled Salmon with Citrus Quinoa
description: Seared salmon fillets served over citrusy quinoa with charred asparagus.
instructions: Cook quinoa with water and orange juice.
Grill salmon and asparagus until cooked, serve over quinoa.

title: Lentil & Sweet Potato Stew
description: Hearty lentil stew with sweet potatoes, kale, and smoky spices.
instructions: Simmer lentils, sweet potatoes, and broth until tender, stir in kale.

title: Pesto Pasta with Roasted Vegetables
description: Herby basil pesto tossed with roasted zucchini, peppers, and al dente penne.
instructions: Roast vegetables, cook pasta, and toss everything with pesto.

title: Tofu Peanut Lettuce Wraps
description: Crispy tofu crumbles tossed in peanut sauce, served in lettuce cups.
instructions: Crisp tofu, stir in sauces, and spoon into lettuce leaves with veggies.

title: Thai Green Curry
description: Fragrant coconut curry simmered with eggplant, bamboo shoots, and basil.
instructions: Simmer curry paste with coconut milk, add vegetables, cook until tender.

title: Roasted Butternut Squash Soup
description: Velvety roasted squash blended with sage brown butter and a touch of cream.
instructions: Roast vegetables, blend with broth, finish with sage butter and cream.

title: Crispy Falafel Pita Wraps
description: Oven-baked falafel tucked into warm pita with tahini sauce and crunchy veggies.
instructions: Blend falafel mixture, form patties, bake until crisp, stuff into pita with tahini.

title: Kimchi Fried Rice
description: Spicy kimchi fried rice topped with crispy spam cubes and a fried egg.
instructions: Crisp spam, stir-fry with kimchi and rice, finish with gochujang and fried egg.

title: Chickpea Tikka Masala
description: Creamy tomato-onion sauce simmered with spiced chickpeas and cashew cream.
instructions: Blend cashew cream, simmer tomato sauce with spices, stir in chickpeas and cream.

title: Herb Roasted Chicken & Potatoes
description: One-pan roasted chicken thighs with lemony potatoes and green beans.
instructions: Toss everything with oil and herbs, roast until chicken is crisp and potatoes tender.

title: Berry Almond Baked Oatmeal
description: Meal-prep friendly baked oats with mixed berries, almonds, and maple syrup.
instructions: Mix oats with wet ingredients and berries, bake until set and golden.

title: Chipotle Fish Tacos
description: Spiced white fish tucked into tortillas with cabbage slaw and lime crema.
instructions: Season fish, sear until flaky, assemble tacos with slaw and crema.

title: Caprese Stuffed Portobellos
description: Broiled portobello caps topped with mozzarella, tomatoes, and balsamic glaze.
instructions: Broil mushrooms, top with mozzarella and tomato, broil again and drizzle glaze.

title: Harissa Roasted Cauliflower Bowls
description: Roasted cauliflower tossed with harissa and served with herbed yogurt and farro.
instructions: Toss cauliflower with harissa and oil, roast at 220°C for 25 minutes.
Cook farro until tender.
Serve bowls with farro, roasted cauliflower, and mint yogurt.

title: Banh Mi Rice Bowls
description: All the flavors of a banh mi sandwich layered over fragrant rice with pickled veggies.
instructions: Quick-pickle carrot and daikon in rice vinegar, sugar, and salt.
Marinate pork with soy, fish sauce, garlic, and sauté until caramelized.
Assemble bowls with rice, pork, pickles, cucumber, cilantro, and chili mayo.

title: Chocolate Avocado Mousse
description: Silky dairy-free chocolate mousse whipped with ripe avocados and espresso.
instructions: Blend avocado, cocoa, maple syrup, espresso, vanilla, and salt until smooth.
Chill for 20 minutes and serve with berries.

title: Mango Coconut Smoothie Bowl
description: Tropical smoothie bowl topped with toasted coconut, chia seeds, and granola.
instructions: Blend mango, coconut milk, and banana until thick.
Pour into bowls and top with chia seeds, granola, and coconut.

title: Saffron Pistachio Kheer
description: Creamy Indian rice pudding infused with saffron, cardamom, and pistachios.
instructions: Simmer rice in milk until tender.
Stir in condensed milk, saffron, and cardamom. Cook until thickened.
Chill slightly and garnish with pistachios.

title: Citrus & Farro Harvest Salad
description: Ruby grapefruit, shaved fennel, and chewy farro tossed in a honey-citrus vinaigrette.
instructions: Cook farro until tender, drain, and cool.
Whisk olive oil, honey, citrus juices, and vinegar with salt and pepper.
Toss farro with arugula, fennel, citrus, goat cheese, and pistachios; drizzle dressing.

title: Charred Corn & Scallion Fritters
description: Crispy sweet-corn fritters with smoked paprika aioli for dipping.
instructions: Whisk flour, baking powder, paprika, eggs, and lime zest into a batter.
Fold in charred corn and scallions.
Pan-fry scoops of batter until golden and serve with aioli.

title: Miso Glazed Salmon & Soba
description: Broiled salmon lacquered with miso-maple glaze served over chilled soba noodles.
instructions: Brush salmon with miso, maple, vinegar, and broil until caramelized.
Cook soba, rinse cold, and toss with sesame oil, edamame, and cucumber.
Serve salmon over noodles with extra glaze.

title: Za'atar Lamb Meatballs
description: Oven-roasted lamb meatballs with sumac yogurt, charred tomatoes, and herbs.
instructions: Combine lamb, breadcrumbs, egg, za'atar, garlic, and salt; roll into meatballs.
Bake with cherry tomatoes at 220°C for 15-18 minutes.
Blend yogurt with sumac and drizzle over meatballs with mint.

title: Herby White Bean Toast
description: Creamy cannellini beans with lemon, dill, and crispy shallots on toasted sourdough.
instructions: Sauté shallots in olive oil until crisp and set aside.
Warm beans with garlic, lemon zest, and juice; mash lightly.
Spoon beans onto toasted sourdough, top with dill, arugula, and crispy shallots.

title: Roasted Beet & Burrata Salad
description: Charred citrus beets layered with creamy burrata, pistachio dust, and arugula.
instructions: Roast sliced beets with olive oil, salt, pepper, and thyme at 200°C for 30-35 minutes.
Whisk blood orange juice with balsamic, remaining oil, and a pinch of salt.
Layer arugula, roasted beets, torn burrata, pistachios, and drizzle the citrus dressing.

title: Smoky Chickpea & Tomato Stew
description: Slow-simmered tomatoes, chickpeas, and smoked paprika finished with lemon yogurt.
instructions: Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil until translucent.
Stir in paprika, cumin, chickpeas, tomatoes, and broth; simmer 20 minutes.
Fold in spinach to wilt, finish with lemon juice, and serve with yogurt drizzle.

title: Leek & Gruyère Tart
description: Buttery puff pastry filled with caramelized leeks, thyme, and aged Gruyère.
instructions: Cook leeks with butter and thyme until jammy.
Blind bake puff pastry in tart pan for 10 minutes.
Whisk eggs, cream, Dijon, fold in Gruyère and leeks, bake until set and golden.

title: Coconut & Lime Poached Chicken
description: Fragrant coconut milk broth with lemongrass-poached chicken and charred snap peas.
instructions: Simmer coconut milk with lemongrass, lime leaves, ginger, and fish sauce.
Add chicken breasts, poach gently until cooked through, then shred.
Blister snap peas separately, add to broth with lime juice and cilantro.

title: Charred Broccolini Soba Bowls
description: Toasted sesame soba with blistered broccolini, miso dressing, and soft-boiled eggs.
instructions: Cook soba according to package instructions, rinse under cold water, and toss with sesame oil.
Char broccolini in a hot pan until lightly blistered.
Whisk miso, rice vinegar, soy sauce, and a splash of noodle water. Toss bowls with noodles, broccolini, dressing, eggs, and sesame seeds.

title: Citrus Herb Seabass
description: Pan-seared seabass with charred fennel, cara cara oranges, and basil oil.
instructions: Sear fennel in olive oil until caramelized and tender.
Pat seabass dry, season, and cook skin-side down until crisp; baste with butter and garlic.
Serve fillets over fennel with citrus segments and basil oil.

title: Sweet Potato Chipotle Tacos
description: Roasted sweet potatoes, black beans, and charred corn tucked into warm tortillas.
instructions: Roast diced sweet potatoes with chipotle, oil, and salt until tender.
Char corn in a skillet, then toss with black beans and a squeeze of lime.
Warm tortillas and fill with sweet potatoes, beans, corn, cotija, and cilantro.

title: Espresso Chili Braised Beef
description: Fork-tender beef chuck braised with espresso, ancho chili, and dark chocolate.
instructions: Sear beef until deeply browned, then remove from pot.
Sauté onions/garlic, add tomato paste, chili powder, espresso, chocolate, and stock.
Return beef, cover, and braise at 160°C for 2.5 hours until shreddable.
